PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_FurnitureTypeChair
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: A set of specific properties for furniture type chair. HISTORY: First issued in IFC Release R1.5. Renamed from Pset_Chair

PropertyDef.Name: SeatingHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The value of seating height if the chair height is not adjustable.

PropertyDef.Name: HighestSeatingHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The value of seating height of high level if the chair height is adjustable.

PropertyDef.Name: LowestSeatingHeight
PropertyDef.Definition: The value of seating height of low level if the chair height is adjustable.
